metadata.title: CVE-2023-38592 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin iOS 16.6 and iPadOS 16.6, watchOS 9.6, tvOS 16.6, macOS Ventura 13.5.Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
